overview:
Think Robert Duval in the Godfather…Rob enjoys the role of Consigliere. The man behind the scenes. The glue that connects different personalities. Trusted Advisor…

A broad background in technology, recruiting and business development has allowed Rob to see first-hand what works and what doesn’t when it comes to success, especially in a start-up environment.

Rob is primarily tasked with making sure that Originate Labs has the best people and making sure those people are growing with the company. Originate is the ultimate partner for extraordinary entrepreneurs and in order to be the ultimate partner, Originate needs people with the correct mix of engineering/marketing/business know-how and entrepreneurial spirit.

Rob’s goal is to make “Originate” synonymous with the word “Start-up”. When people in the tech and investment community gather to discuss the “next big thing in Technology”, they should say, “Yeah, Originate’s working on that problem.” or “Yeah, Originate already did that a couple years ago” or “Did you talk to Originate about that yet??!!!”
